2599 Are you interested in the digital world of Agriculture  Do you want to contribute to the development of sustainable farming systems through digital   data driven solutions  Are you innovative and an enthusiastic team player  Then we would like to meet you The Challenge Agrifirm is looking for a full time  40 hour  Data Scientist who is specialized in applied data insights  As a Data Scientist you will contribute to the development and implementation of digital solutions  You will work on different levels in strong connection with the Product Owner and Research and you will also be the bridge between the product team and the data science department  You will be working in a multi disciplinary team in a network organization with limited hierarchy and plenty of room for development  Responsibilities  Responsible for defining and setup of  joint  research and implementation projects  Contributing to  joint  research and development projects  Active networking with stakeholders for knowledge gathering and development of future oriented added value concepts  Analysis of data using statistical models and methods  For example  The nutrition department wants to know whether there is a relationship between the composition of the supplied feed and the production results of the broilers  Develop and maintain mathematical models  For example  The planning department asks for a model that predicts when new feed orders have to be placed What can we find on your CV Experience in working in a business environment  In possession of an MSc Degree mathematics  econometrics or similar  You speak English fluently  About one year of experience in data handling and modelling  Experience in working with R  Python and Databricks  Experience in PowerBI is an advantage This is you You have strong communication skills  You are a team player  are enthusiastic and know how to take ownership  You have a passion for data and want to get the most out of it  Project management is something you are good at  You are market oriented and know how to make and create impact  Our offerA challenging full time job within an enthusiastic and committed team where cooperation and results come first  As a colleague at Agrifirm you will receive the following  An extensive introduction program  A good salary  Approx  36 free days  23 holidays   13 ATV based on a full time job   Laptop and an iPhone  Good secondary employment conditions  Extensive development opportunities through our Agrifirm AcademyRoyal Agrifirm The vision of Agrifirm is to work each day to a responsible food chain for future generations  If you want to contribute to this  then there is a great career ahead of you at Agrifirm  You can apply through the application button  Your questions can be aimed at Sela Ford  Corporate Recruiter on  31  0 6   13 18 49 76  An  online  assessment is part of the procedure  Acquisition in response to this vacancy will not be appreciated  CV s submitted through recruitment organisations via email  internet or directly without a valid written agreement are seen as property of Agrifirm  No costs will be paid if the candidate in question is accepted by Agrifirm    LI SF1  Why should you be interested in joining us  At Royal Agrifirm Group  we are passionate about farming  We want to make the difference  care about the future and aim high  Together we can be the best  we can create relevant impact worldwide  Join us on our journey to create a responsible food chain for future generations

job_desc: Position Description  Wil jij meebouwen aan onze strategie om klanten binnen de wereld van Transport   Logistics verder te helpen  Zie jij het als een uitdaging om onze diensten en producten voor deze klanten te verbeteren en verder uit te breiden Wat ga je doen  Als Data Scientist help je mee met het uitbreiden van onze positie bij klanten in de wereld van Transport en Logistiek  Je houdt je bezig met complexe problemen van klanten waarbij een beroep wordt gedaan op jouw analytische vaardigheden  Jij voert slimme analyses uit en maakt daarbij gebruik van de nieuwste concepten en mogelijkheden zoals machine learning  predictive modelling en deep learning  Jij houdt je bezig met verschillende projecten zoals het ontwikkelen slimme algoritmiek waarmee we complexe verkeersstromen in kaart brengen  Of modellen die bepalen hoe groot de kans is dat iemand thuis is als de bezorgdienst een pakketje komt bezorgen  Ook hebben we een methode ontwikkeld om reizigers op luchthavens te koppelen aan hun bagage door gebruik te maken van image recognition technieken  Je bent in staat om industrie  en IT trends te vertalen naar  innovatie  oplossingen  die passen bij de bedrijfsvoering van onze klanten  Je neemt hiervoor deel aan business development  en sales trajecten met als doel nieuwe kansen te creëren bij bestaande of nieuwe klanten van CGI Wat breng je mee  Je hebt een passie voor data en innovatie  Je bent van nature nieuwsgierig  proactief en weet gemakkelijk anderen voor jouw ideeën te winnen  Daarnaast ben je actief in kennisdeling en  ontwikkeling binnen je vakgebied en bezit je aantoonbare consultancy vaardigheden  Verder heb jij Een afgeronde WO of HBO opleiding met een sterke statistiek component  zoals  toegepaste  wiskunde  technische natuurkunde  econometrie of data science Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring als Data Scientist in het publieke of commerciële domein Kennis en ervaring met het gebruik van advanced analytics  big data  machine learning  deep learning Ervaring in het vertalen van bedrijfsproblemen of  uitdagingen naar oplossingen Aantoonbare ervaring in het oplossen van complexe uitdagingen met behulp van data analyse en modellering Aantoonbare kennis en ervaring met Big Data concepten en technologieën zoals Hadoop  MapReduce  SAS  R en of Python Kennis op het gebied van Agile werkmethoden Aantoonbare ervaring met cloudplatformen  zoals Azure  AWS of Google Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en schrift  Waar kom je terecht  Als Data Scientist kom je te werken binnen de unit Smart Logistics van de sector Defense  Transport   Logistics  CGI biedt een uitdagende  dynamische en afwisselende omgeving waarbij jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling centraal staat  We zijn een grote organisatie  maar door het gebruik van kleine teams bevorderen we de persoonlijke aandacht  Naast ons werk bij de klant  delen we kennis en discussiëren we met collega s binnen de practices over nieuwe ontwikkelingen binnen jouw specialisatie  Discussies die leiden tot tastbare oplossingen die passen in de digitale transformatie van onze klanten  CGI helpt Nederland voorop te gaan in de concurrentiestrijd en in te spelen op de gedigitaliseerde samenleving waarbij iedereen en alles  connected  is  Waar mensen snel en veilig kunnen reizen en transport en logistiek  kosten  efficiënt en betrouwbaar zijn geregeld Leuk je te ontmoeten   Wij zijn i2i  een jonge  ambitieuze  en doelgerichte organisatie gevestigd in Amsterdam  i2i richt zich op één van de belangrijkste maatschappelijke uitdagingen in de zorg  kostenbeheersing in de zorg met behoud van kwaliteit en toegankelijkheid  Hoe kunnen we ervoor zorgen dat wij het beste rendement op iedere geïnvesteerde euro in de zorg realiseren  Wij hebben hiervoor het  Doelmatig Direct Declareren Partnership model   DDD Partnership  ontwikkeld  waarmee zorgverleners die bewezen zinnige zorg leveren worden beloond  Het vertrouwen tussen verzekeraar en zorgverlener wordt hiermee vergroot  de administratieve lasten nemen af en de zorggelden worden aantoonbaar zinnig besteed   Met 40 collega s werken wij samen met ziekenhuizen  apotheken en GGZ instellingen aan zinnige zorg  Deze zorgaanbieders realiseren hiermee voor hen voordelen als betere inkoopvoorwaarden  minder administratieve lasten  verbetering van interne processen en een  nog  beter maatschappelijk imago  Dagelijks is i2i in gesprek met medisch specialisten gericht op het realiseren van een gedragsverandering in kosteneffectiviteit en kwaliteit van geleverde zorg   Wat je gaat doen  Als Data Scientist bén je de intelligentie van i2i  Je gebruikt je analytische talent om verbeterpotentieel in de kosteneffectiviteit en kwaliteit van de zorg te identificeren  Deze We re Creative Fabrica  a fast scaling tech start up from Amsterdam   Our mission  Enable creativity by giving access to everything related to the creative process  inspiration  learning  creating and sharing  The  Creative Inspiration Flywheel  This creates a self sustaining community that lives within the Creative Fabrica ecosystem   About the platform  We launched in 2016 as a marketplace for fonts with a subscription service  In the last 6 years we have been through tremendous growth  and we re just getting started   We have scaled to 30 million  monthly page views  viewing over 4 million listed products from 10000  active designers   Our focus is to create a platform for designers that enables them to offer exceptional high quality content  We make their products searchable in unique ways  This allows our customers to speed up their workflow  allowing them to focus on what they love most  Creating   How will you help us   The Head of Data Science   Analytics is the driving force behind the company s data quality  data analytics  data science and experimentation strategy and execution  In this role you will be responsible for attracting and retaining high caliber data analysts and data scientists focused on innovation and rapid iteration  You will report to the VP of Product   You and your team will be owning the data systems for collecting  storing and analyzing data  We are entering a phase of exponential growth and need to scale the tools  data lakes and pipelines to enable data driven product development and decision making at Creative Fabrica   You  along with your team  will dig into the data to uncover insights  identify opportunities for product improvements and new product development  define product metrics with goals  enable experiments and drive customer experience  engagement  and adoption of Creative Fabrica products  As you are building your team we also need you to be hands on and deliver on data needs   Responsibilities  Foster data driven culture of innovation  iteration  and ownership throughout all of Creative Fabrica Recruit  manage and lead a team of world class data analysts and data scientists to support our aggressive growth and deliver key data products and capabilities Be the subject matter expert for driving the product instrumentation  including web tracking tools like Google Analytics and Amplitude  and product data strategy Drive data consistency and quality within a common framework and taxonomy to drive continued improvements to data driven insights across the business Own both the long term technical data strategy and the day to day operations  including fostering innovation and implementing best practices Collaborate with cross functional teams to research  build   improve data analyses to identify opportunities for product improvements  new product features  product utilization and improve customer experience  engagement  and retention Lead the creation of new data driven approaches for the purpose of generating business insights through data analytics  information visualization  and addressing unanswered business issues in a proactive manner Leverage the momentum of the business to create career defining growth opportunities for your team Facilitate Creative Fabrica s development ensuring that data enables continued growth  including marketplace dynamics technologies Design data governance and security protocols Represent the data analytics and data science disciplines throughout the organization  You will have a powerful voice in the company and represent data analytics across different parts of the business  Attract and retain a diverse  high caliber  output oriented team Profile   Essential  Bachelor s degree  or higher  in Data Science  Mathematics  Computer Science  Physics or equivalent  8  years of experience leading and building out a Data Analytics   Data Science team Strong background on Data Engineering and Web tracking tooling  Experience building powerful yet easy to use and adopt data systems and tools supporting high volume and reliable interactive modeling  analysis  and experimentation Proven track record of strong stakeholder management  interacting with senior company leadership on complex issues  Required  Good verbal and written English communication skills Ability to lead and coach while creating a high performance culture  Let us take care of you  Competitive Compensation  We believe that hard work  skills and ambition should be fairly compensated  Flexibility  30 remote days per year  Need a change of scene  Take your laptop  pack a bag and work from the woods  your parents  place or the beach  The best tools and stylish kit  Laptop  Check  Collaboration tools  Check  Killer accessories  Check  Awesome Office  Based in a beautiful office in the centre  working here means delicious lunches in the garden  Friday beers at our local  and access to our own CF library  TGIF  Work Life balance is important   we work hard together  and we have fun together  On Fridays we turn on the speakers  and start celebrating the weekend  Is this you   Get in touch  We d love to speak to you   You can apply by clicking the  Apply now  button   Creative Fabrica is an equal opportunity employer  We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

skills: azure, sql, tableau, python, rest, saas
job_desc: Would you like to put your data analytics experience to use in an independent and responsible role at a fast growing tech scale up ChannelEngine is looking for an enthusiastic Data Analyst to work alongside our business and technical teams to create business value through data  We re working on some cool projects and need more talented people in the team to make our company goals a reality  We re building a data platform  migrating to Azure  and working on machine learning models  You ll be involved in all of this  as well as the day to day of helping convert all the useful e commerce data we have in our platform into digestible business intelligence to provide our stakeholders with the right insights to aid their decision making  What else will you be doing  Using business insight and technical knowledge to define  develop and deliver analytics solutions for stakeholders Liaising with external clients who request data or reporting solutions Communicating with business stakeholders to understand key metrics  analyse business and technical requirements then develop reporting   data applications Developing and maintaining ETL   ELT pipelines and data components to extend and optimise the ChannelEngine data platform Developing rich  intuitive automated dashboards Developing ad hoc reports and providing analytics services to support business decision making processes Searching and applying tools and or methodologies to foster data analytics best practices Documenting relevant code  business requirements and technical processes Providing support to the development of training materials and training activities related to the BI tools and applications Debugging issues  discrepancies and finding root causes  What you ll need Bachelor s degree in Maths  Data Science  or a similar field Minimum 4  years  experience as a developer or analyst within an analytics teams Minimum 2  years  experience in data modelling and SQL Ability to understand and analyse business processes and requirements Experience in dashboard development using PowerBI  Tableau  Looker or a similar tool Excellent communication skills in English  both written and verbal Active listening skills and a proactive approach Willingness to learn new things Availability to work 32 40 hours per week Eligibility to work in the Netherlands without visa sponsorship  Nice to have Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform experience Some Python skills  What can we offer you  Number 1  working at a company that is at the forefront of the world of e commerce and online marketplaces An interesting industry  marketplaces are booming  therefore our company is thriving This is a new role  You will have the opportunity and resources to implement your bright ideas together with the rest of the team We are in the process of building a data platform which brings plenty of interesting challenges   no two days are the same We have plenty of data and lots of demand to consume it State of the art tech  we work with the latest technologies  business models and tools  We re currently migrating to Azure Personal and professional development within a fast growing company with international plans and ambitions Work in our modern office next to Leiden Central Station  with views across the city or  of course  from home We want our colleagues to be happy and healthy  so there are quality chairs and sit stand desks to work at  as well as other ergonomic tools at your disposal Free healthy  and slightly less healthy  snacks  the widest selection of tea you ve ever seen  and exceptionally good coffee to keep you well fuelled throughout the day A very social and passionate team  We have lunch with colleagues  and we like to do fun activities together  About ChannelEngine ChannelEngine is a fast growing  e commerce SaaS solution  We help brands  retailers and wholesalers find millions of new customers by connecting them to the biggest marketplaces around the world Our story began in 2013 when it became undeniable that marketplaces were going to be one of the most critical components of the global e commerce industry  We saw an opportunity to make these powerful platforms available to every business  and now ChannelEngine offers a complete  user friendly  marketplace management suite with seamless integration  enabling businesses to expand their reach internationally  Our clients include Bugaboo  Hunkemöller  Brabantia  Bosch  JDE  and Reckitt  to name just a few ChannelEngine is growing at a rapid pace and currently covers channels in Europe  North  and Central America  the Middle East  and Asia Pacific  Our mission is to cover the globe  For this  we need to expand our teams with adventurous and ambitious people who want to shape the world of e commerce with us Are you up for the challenge  Don t hesitate to send us your application today Job Type  Full time

Den Haag WO Jaarcontract met uitzicht op vast dienstverband 2 811 tot 5 139 Volg jij ook de stormachtige ontwikkelingen in de energietransitie  Wil jij bijdragen aan een betrouwbare cijfermatige onderbouwing hiervan  Word onderzoeker energietransitie bij het CBS en solliciteer meteen  Ben jij er klaar voor  Jouw uitdaging De energiewereld is in transitie en we zoeken daarom mensen die kennis inbrengen en kunnen verzamelen  Je kunt daarbij denken aan onderwerpen als de waterstoftoepassingen in de industrie  energieopslag d m v  batterijen  biomassa als grondstof voor de industrie  warmtepompen en stadsverwarming  Je voegt deze nieuwe data vervolgens toe in het bestaande productieproces van onze statistieken  Deze statistieken brengen alle energiestromen  aanbod en verbruik  en alle energiedragers  zowel fossiele als hernieuwbare  in kaart  Je werkt mee aan  nieuwe onderzoeken ontwikkelingen op gebied van de energiestatistieken  bestaande publicaties op maand   kwartaal  en jaarbasis van de energievoorziening  het verbeteren van het huidige verwerkingsproces  van brondata tot publicatie  het schrijven en publiceren van verdiepingsartikelen en methoderapportages  Zo ziet je team eruit Teametentje We gaan twee keer per jaar uit eten met het hele team  Helaas best lastig plannen met de Coronamaatregelen  Frisse neus In de lunchpauze gaan we graag met een groepje wandelen  Je team We zijn met zijn 25 en  hebben diverse leeftijden  opleidingen en ervaring én een passie voor energiecijfers  Publicaties Op de pagina Energietransitie van de CBS website vind je en het is zeker mogelijk om gaandeweg te ontdekken wat het beste bij je past binnen de kaders van het totale werkpakket We werken in hybride vorm thuis en op kantoor  als dat mogelijk is i v m  de of SQL  Je bent collegiaal en gericht op samenwerking binnen en buiten je eigen team  Je kunt je eigen werk goed plannen en organiseren en geeft tijdig aan wat wel en niet haalbaar is  Wat hebben we job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent employee benefits and perks  including bonus potential  Answers to your questions  Inge Loog is available to answer any questions you may have about this role  Contact Inge at inge loog eyeon nl  An individual assessment is part of our selection procedure

Vacature   Junior  Data AnalistOver SynaxionSynaxion is een ICT organisatie en heeft sinds het begin van dit millennium een sterke focus op organisaties met een maatschappelijke functie  In deze  semi Publieke sector biedt Synaxion aan Gemeenten  Onderwijsinstellingen en Bibliotheken haar markt specifieke Business Intelligence software oplossingen en dienstverlening Data Quality  Data Ontsluiting  Data Analytics  Data Visualisatie  Data Science zijn de kern van onze propositie  met als basis het Synaxion Datawarehouse Inmiddels werken honderden organisaties met het Synaxion Datawarehouse en met onze dienstverlening voor Microsoft Power BI voor visueel aantrekkelijke en overzichtelijke dashboards voor rapportage en analyse  Help jij onze klanten met het ontsluiten  het modelleren en het visualiseren van data Synaxion maakt sinds juli 2021 deel uit van de Visma familie  Door samen de  semi publieke markt te benaderen  kunnen we onze ambities nog beter waarmaken  Onze ambitie is om de werelden van eGovernment en Business Intelligence   Data Science nog meer bij elkaar te brengenFunctieomschrijvingEen Data Analist bij Synaxion zet zijn haar kennis en ervaring in en levert een belangrijke bijdrage aan het optimaliseren en verbeteren van  werk processen van onze klanten Als Data Analist ga je aan de slag met het analyseren van HR  financiële en onderwijs gegevens  Je hebt een kritische blik en richt je op zowel beschrijvende  verklarende en voorspellende analyses  Door middel van gesprekken met de klant breng je de informatiebehoefte in kaart en stel je de requirements op  Vervolgens ga je aan de slag met het bouwen van rapportages in Power BI  Als Data Analist denk je proactief naar oplossingen  passend bij de situatie van de klant  Je neemt de klanten mee in het traject met visueel aantrekkelijke analyses die het verschil maken Het verschil maken doen we door data uit interne en externe databronnen te combineren  Op basis van deze data ga je als Data Analist aan de slag met voorspellingen en zet signaleringen en adviezen uit zodat we onze klanten in het onderwijs nog beter kunnen helpen Wat vragen wij Een afgeronde relevante HBO WO opleiding  bijvoorbeeld Informatie Management  Econometrie of Data Science  Ervaring met Business Intelligence tools  bij voorkeur Power BI  Kennis van en of ervaring met relationele datamodellen  bij voorkeur MS SQL  Je Your energy As an Energy Data Expert at System Operations  you work with multidisciplinary teams to create the electrical grid of the future  The energy transition presents Alliander with an enormous challenge  The increase in decentralised generation  increasing electricity consumption  the introduction of heat grids and new gases in a single integrated energy system  alongside the creation of the infrastructure and market facilitation to realise these energy flows  necessitate a fundamentally different approach to our processes and services  The team at System Operations works hard to deliver solutions that allow us to make smarter and more efficient use of our electrical grids for our customers  And that s where you come in  because you re the team s technical expert  Your daily work involves transforming innovative ideas for our customers into concrete solutions and processes  One example is a new grid structure that allows us to prevent and resolve congestion in the electrical grid  As an expert at System Operations  you are capable of thinking outside the box  You continuously develop new  technologically innovative solutions  Your environment You and your fellow experts are the technical core and the beating heart of a Scrum team that brings together expertise about energy technology  As a team  you have the space and autonomy to determine your own course as you design and realise the electrical grid of the future  while coordinating as necessary with your environment  In concrete terms  your work involves developing concepts and carrying out grid calculations to realise customer connections without making major capital investments  This is how you contribute to an affordable  reliable and stable electrical grid for today and tomorrow  You are part of one or more multidisciplinary teams that  assess and estimate the impact of customer applications  new customer propositions and technological innovations on our grids and systems  determine the conditions to allow new solutions to be implemented  implement  or arrange the implementation of  technological innovations and modifications within and beyond System Operations in consultation with stakeholders  At the front end  you ensure effective coordination with our end users and supply chain partners  You work with your fellow experts specialists  Scrum masters and product owners  You prepare and maintain user stories and prioritise these based on the backlog  Your employer We are Alliander  a group made up of various companies  including Liander  Qirion and Kenter  We develop and maintain the electrical grid for millions of users in the Netherlands  That s quite a challenge  especially as the energy transition is now in full swing  Thankfully  we can count on the knowledge and skills of our 7 000 professionals  Together  we devise and realise technically smart solutions to prepare our electrical grid for the future  We also try to minimise our carbon emissions while doing business sustainably  In this role  you will join the 7 000 employees of Liander  the grid operator  Together  they manage the daily distribution of gas and electricity through our grids  You share your expertise within the System Operations department  On the work floor  you ll find 15 multidisciplinary teams of 7 10 people who are young at heart and ambitious  Although the teams work hard  there s still time for a joke and a friendly pat on the shoulder  Thanks to the intensive teamwork  they are also very close  System Operations works in an Agile way to deliver the energy supply of the future  One example is the spike app  which allows us to predict and resolve spikes in our grid load  This helps us prevent our electrical grids from becoming overloaded and ensures a reliable energy supply for our customers  System Operations is thus an essential part of Liander and is always looking for new innovations that improve our service  Your working conditions You have the energy  we give you the space   the space to get the best out of yourself  Because that benefits everyone  you  Alliander and most of all our customers  And there s more  In this role  you can expect  based on a 38 hour working week   A good salary  depending on your training and experience  junior max  gross monthly salary  4 530  scale 8   mid level max  gross monthly salary  5 127  scale 9  gross monthly salary  senior max  gross monthly salary  6 001  scale 10   A permanent contract after one year  A Personal Budget of 18  of your annual salary on a full time basis  You can choose to have this paid out  to purchase extra leave days or to pay it into your pension  An allowance of 70  of the statutory minimum wage for parental leave hours  This applies if you take parental leave after one year of service  36 hours  4 5 days  extra saved leave each year  You can use this leave or save it for up to 10 years for a sabbatical etc  A long term employability budget of  500  You can use this for career development  a gym membership and or ergonomic home office furniture etc  A pension with ABP  Alliander pays 70  of your pension premium  A fixed year end bonus of 5 94   Alliander offers you plenty of space and opportunities for development  We work with the best trainers in the Netherlands  You can choose from a wide range of training courses  workshops  study programmes  study books  webinars and e learning modules  An NS Business Card or a mileage allowance if you travel by car  A gross contribution of  360 and discounts on supplementary insurance if you have a collective health insurance policy with Zilveren Kruis Achmea  A laptop and mobile phone  or Bring Your Own Device  You ll be surprised by the excellent working conditions at Alliander  We have listed these for you at https   werkenbij alliander com arbeidsvoorwaarden Your background Your energy means you excel as an expert  Your motivation  skills and broad perspective help you take the team to the next level  You actively seek out collaboration  both within and beyond System Operations  You are a hard worker who can operate effectively at the strategic  tactical and operational level  and you don t give up easily  You re not afraid to try new things  At System Operations  we believe in  learning by doing   This also means you have a huge amount of freedom to work autonomously as a team  This role offers you the opportunity to develop and grow into the role of senior expert or Product Owner  In your work  Energy Technology and IT come together  What we ask of you  At least a completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in electrical engineering  energy technology  control engineering  physics or mechanical engineering and experience with IT or A completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in IT Data Science and experience with electrical engineering  energy technology or physics Experience with low voltage  medium voltage or high voltage grid structures or security concepts  load flow calculations  short circuit calculations or selectivity calculations would be an advantage  That you are an innovative thinker with strong analytical skills and problem solving competences who can bridge the gap between energy technology and IT solutions  That you are flexible and focused on innovation  you are motivated to include your colleagues in new applications  including in non technical areas   Please note  you must be resident in the Netherlands  If you do not live in the Netherlands  we will not be able to process your application  Your action We have space for your energy  If you would like more information about this vacancy  please contact Peter Wessels  System Development Chapter Lead  on peter wessels alliander com or 06 52305498  If you would like more information about the application procedure  please contact Astrid van Dijk  Corporate Recruiter  on astrid van dijk alliander documents and degree certificates  an integrity survey and requesting a certificate of good conduct  The application procedure may include an assessment  Recruiter Astrid van Dijk Telefoonnummer   31 citizenM is a global lifestyle hotel company involved in the full spectrum of the customer journey  from sourcing a potential reservation  to checking in and staying in the hotel  to the design and development of our hotels  This degree of vertical integration is unique in the industry  This gives us an incredibly rich dataset to collect  transform  and analyze in order to improve the effectiveness of the operating model and therefore guest experience  Much of this data is combined in citizenM s data platform  If data to you is like a bee to honey then we have the honey pot for you purpose As a data analyst on the hotel operations domain you will have the opportunity to work citizenM s rich data sources  You will be preparing dashboards and performing in depth analysis to provide insights in the operational activities around our hotels so that we can smoothen our operations and optimize our guest experience  This role is part of the Business Intelligence Team  where you will be working closely with all functions in the team to transform data into wisdom for different disciplines within citizenM  As part of this role you will collaborate closely with the  hotel  operations team  key responsibilities  leading consumer insight initiatives in an agile way together with all relevant business units  develop dashboards in PowerBI which allow relevant teams to generate insights and track performance around operational hotel initiatives such as food   beverage  housekeeping and guest satisfaction  identify the requests for operational insights and separate the nice to knows from the need to knows  translate these requests into valid research questions  work with big data sets in our data platform to generate the required insights you are able to translate these outcomes into useful insights and to prepare proposals for metrics and solutions  you will apply different data visualization and storytelling techniques in order to convey the message  in this role you should have a curious mind and will analyze data proactively in order to propose areas in need for insights and in order to seize business opportunities  since you will work closely with the core business units you should understand what is happening at citizenM and be able to develop a strong network across several layers within the organization  qualifications   skills a genuine passion for data and the ability to combine analytical data skills with business knowledge  a bachelor  masters preferred  degree  preferably in the field of data analytics  data science or business analytics  proven proficiency in the use of PowerBI  understanding of relational modeling and relational databases  mainly SQL   affinity with a statistical  data science  programming language for advanced analytics  such as R or Python  attention to detail and a creative mindset  ability to succeed in both collaborative and independent work environments  strong communication skills   both written and oral   in order to convey complex analytical results clearly  you re eager to understand and learn about operational processes and the data that is generated through these processes  experience with Agile way of working  locations   hours Voorschoten Support office  Hybrid working is possible  not fully remote  This is a full time position  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds  citizenM loves diversity  We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from anyone   AS  LI Hybrid

job_desc: Position Description  Wil jij meebouwen aan onze strategie om klanten binnen de wereld van Transport   Logistics verder te helpen  Zie jij het als een uitdaging om onze diensten en producten voor deze klanten te verbeteren en verder uit te breiden Wat ga je doen  Als Data Scientist help je mee met het uitbreiden van onze positie bij klanten in de wereld van Transport en Logistiek  Je houdt je bezig met complexe problemen van klanten waarbij een beroep wordt gedaan op jouw analytische vaardigheden  Jij voert slimme analyses uit en maakt daarbij gebruik van de nieuwste concepten en mogelijkheden zoals machine learning  predictive modelling en deep learning  Jij houdt je bezig met verschillende projecten zoals het ontwikkelen slimme algoritmiek waarmee we complexe verkeersstromen in kaart brengen  Of modellen die bepalen hoe groot de kans is dat iemand thuis is als de bezorgdienst een pakketje komt bezorgen  Ook hebben we een methode ontwikkeld om reizigers op luchthavens te koppelen aan hun bagage door gebruik te maken van image recognition technieken  Je bent in staat om industrie  en IT trends te vertalen naar  innovatie  oplossingen  die passen bij de bedrijfsvoering van onze klanten  Je neemt hiervoor deel aan business development  en sales trajecten met als doel nieuwe kansen te creëren bij bestaande of nieuwe klanten van CGI Wat breng je mee  Je hebt een passie voor data en innovatie  Je bent van nature nieuwsgierig  proactief en weet gemakkelijk anderen voor jouw ideeën te winnen  Daarnaast ben je actief in kennisdeling en  ontwikkeling binnen je vakgebied en bezit je aantoonbare consultancy vaardigheden  Verder heb jij Een afgeronde WO of HBO opleiding met een sterke statistiek component  zoals  toegepaste  wiskunde  technische natuurkunde  econometrie of data science Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring als Data Scientist in het publieke of commerciële domein Kennis en ervaring met het gebruik van advanced analytics  big data  machine learning  deep learning Ervaring in het vertalen van bedrijfsproblemen of  uitdagingen naar oplossingen Aantoonbare ervaring in het oplossen van complexe uitdagingen met behulp van data analyse en modellering Aantoonbare kennis en ervaring met Big Data concepten en technologieën zoals Hadoop  MapReduce  SAS  R en of Python Kennis op het gebied van Agile werkmethoden Aantoonbare ervaring met cloudplatformen  zoals Azure  AWS of Google Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en schrift  Waar kom je terecht  Als Data Scientist kom je te werken binnen de unit Smart Logistics van de sector Defense  Transport   Logistics  CGI biedt een uitdagende  dynamische en afwisselende omgeving waarbij jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling centraal staat  We zijn een grote organisatie  maar door het gebruik van kleine teams bevorderen we de persoonlijke aandacht  Naast ons werk bij de klant  delen we kennis en discussiëren we met collega s binnen de practices over nieuwe ontwikkelingen binnen jouw specialisatie  Discussies die leiden tot tastbare oplossingen die passen in de digitale transformatie van onze klanten  CGI helpt Nederland voorop te gaan in de concurrentiestrijd en in te spelen op de gedigitaliseerde samenleving waarbij iedereen en alles  connected  is  Waar mensen snel en veilig kunnen reizen en transport en logistiek  kosten  efficiënt en betrouwbaar zijn geregeld  Duurzaam  rekening houdend met onze begrensde infrastructuur en over alle modaliteiten heen  de weg  het water  het spoor en in de lucht  Dit is mogelijk door vergaand samenwerking met klanten  partners en kennisinstituten  Ook helpt CGI logistieke bedrijven in hun transformatie naar een digitale onderneming en het uitwerken van een digitale strategie  We ondersteunen klanten ook bij het praktisch realiseren van hun digitale ambities  evenals bij het  veilig  toepassen  aanpassen en beheren daarvan  CGI is voorloper op gebied van legacy migration  advanced data analytics  cybersecurity en   misschien wel nergens zo belangrijk als in de logistiek   Internet of Things  Physical Internet en diverse andere emerging technologies  Dit vertaalt zich direct met uitdagingen  waar onze klanten zich in bevinden Ons aanbod  Direct een vaste baan met marktconform salaris en de mogelijkheid om aandeelhouder te worden en zo mee te delen in onze successen  Zo wordt werken bij CGI dubbel beloond  Via de CGI Academy helpen we jou om de juiste trainingen te volgen  want jouw persoonlijke ontwikkeling vinden wij belangrijk  Je krijgt een plek in onze hechte community waar we samen met elkaar de verantwoordelijkheid van projecten dragen en klantverwachtingen overtreffen  Een rol in ons CGI verhaal Are you ready to be part of our story  Solliciteer direct  We nemen dan zo Leuk je te ontmoeten   Wij zijn i2i  een jonge  ambitieuze  en doelgerichte organisatie gevestigd in Amsterdam  i2i richt zich op één van de belangrijkste maatschappelijke uitdagingen in de zorg  kostenbeheersing in de zorg met behoud van kwaliteit en toegankelijkheid  Hoe kunnen we ervoor zorgen dat wij het beste rendement op iedere geïnvesteerde euro in de zorg realiseren  Wij hebben hiervoor het  Doelmatig Direct Declareren Partnership model   DDD Partnership  ontwikkeld  waarmee zorgverleners die bewezen zinnige zorg leveren worden beloond  Het vertrouwen tussen verzekeraar en zorgverlener wordt hiermee vergroot  de administratieve lasten nemen af en de zorggelden worden aantoonbaar zinnig besteed   Met 40 collega s werken wij samen met ziekenhuizen  apotheken en GGZ instellingen aan zinnige zorg  Deze zorgaanbieders realiseren hiermee voor hen voordelen als betere inkoopvoorwaarden  minder administratieve lasten  verbetering van interne processen en een  nog  beter maatschappelijk imago  Dagelijks is i2i in gesprek met medisch specialisten gericht op het realiseren van een gedragsverandering in kosteneffectiviteit en kwaliteit van geleverde zorg   Wat je gaat doen  Als Data Scientist bén je de intelligentie van i2i  Je gebruikt je analytische talent om verbeterpotentieel in de kosteneffectiviteit en kwaliteit van de zorg te identificeren  Deze hypotheses vertaal je in haarscherpe analyses die tot overtuigende inzichten en aanbevelingen leiden  Met als uiteindelijke doel een gedragsverandering bij zorgverleners te realiseren die leidt tot doelmatigere en kwalitatief betere zorg  Nota Bene  We bieden ook werkstudent of stageplekken aan   Activiteiten Identificeren van verbeterpotentieel in kosteneffectiviteit en kwaliteit van zorg Omzetten van hypotheses in analyses Uitvoeren MS SQL R Python analyses Communiceren en rapporteren van inzichten uit analyses Aanbod Kans om jouw talent in te zetten om een maatschappelijke bijdrage te leveren aan het betaalbaar houden en kwalitatief verbeteren van de zorg Stimulerende en plezierige werkomgeving met versneld groeipad  waarin jouw ontwikkeling centraal staat  o a  via de i2i Data Science Academy Inspirerende collega s van uitmuntend kaliber Marktconforme beloning Vereisten Kwalificaties Afgeronde WO opleiding  Pre  Econometrie  Natuurkunde of andere bèta opleiding Creatief  analytisch en oplossingsgericht Teamspeler met capaciteit om zelfstandig te werken Detail georiënteerd  levert feilloze kwaliteit Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse en of Engelse taal Beheersing van het Nederlands bij Engelse talige kandidaten Pre Ervaring met data analyse Ervaring met verwerken   analyseren medische  declaratie  data Ervaring met geautomatiseerde generatie van Data Analist  Ben jij sterk in conclusies en verbanden trekken uit een grote hoeveelheid data  Beschik je over cijfermatig en analytisch inzicht  En heb je affiniteit met logistiek  Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou   KLG Europe is een internationaal logistiek dienstverlener  We zijn een actieve en grote speler in de logistiek en bedienen wereldwijd klanten uit verschillende branches   Jaarlijks groeien we enorm en we hebben de doelstelling om deze groeicurve te behouden  Om dit te realiseren zijn we ter uitbreiding van onze Supply Chain afdeling op zoek naar een Data Analist  De Supply Chain afdeling heeft onder andere als taak het analyseren van data t b v  procesverbetering en het uitwerken van grote logistieke aanvragen  tenders    Wat ga je doen   Je gaat jezelf verdiepen in zowel interne als externe data om hieruit analyses en rapportages op te stellen en KPI s  Key Performance Indicators  te meten  De uitkomsten van deze analyses en rapportages vormen de basis voor verbetering van onze interne processen evenals ons serviceniveau richting klanten  Je weet al deze informatie dan ook prima te communiceren in begrijpelijke taal   Daarnaast assisteer je ons tenderteam met het analyseren en opstellen van aanbiedingen voor grote klanten  Je start hierbij met een verdieping in de eisen van de klant en analyseert alle aangeleverde data in Excel  Vervolgens ga je in overleg met de Operations en Sales afdeling  om de mogelijkheden te onderzoeken die KLG kan bieden  Met deze informatie maak je calculaties en kom je tot een totaal concept   Je taken zijn met name   Analyseren van data afkomstig uit het Warehouse   Transport Management Systeem ten behoeve van het opstellen van simulaties en nacalculaties  Het opstellen van interne   en externe rapportages  Zorgdragen voor juiste communicatie  afstemming en informatieoverdracht naar andere afdelingen  Signaleren van verbeterpunten en deze samen met het team optimaliseren  Het uitwerken van tenders  calculeren en uitwerken van logistieke aanvragen   Proactief bewaken van je werkzaamheden en opstellen van eigen planning  Meedenken en inbreng geven tijdens periodiek te houden overleg   Locatie  Venlo  Dit biedt KLG Europe  Een deskundig team  waarmee je samen het resultaat bereikt en met plezier kunt terugkijken op je werkdag en je afgeronde planning  Werken bij een groeiende en kerngezonde logistieke dienstverlener waar normen en waarden al decennia lang een belangrijke rol spelen  Goede arbeidsvoorwaarden  met een mooi salaris op basis van een fulltime dienstverband  Werken in een laagdrempelige organisatie waar de lijntjes kort zijn  Aandacht en ruimte voor opleiding  persoonlijke ontwikkeling en doorgroeimogelijkheden  Een informele en goede werksfeer  Ruimte voor We re Creative Fabrica  a fast scaling tech start up from Amsterdam   Our mission  Enable creativity by giving access to everything related to the creative process  inspiration  learning  creating and sharing  The  Creative Inspiration Flywheel  This creates a self sustaining community that lives within the Creative Fabrica ecosystem   About the platform  We launched in 2016 as a marketplace for fonts with a subscription service  In the last 6 years we have been through tremendous growth  and we re just getting started   We have scaled to 30 million  monthly page views  viewing over 4 million listed products from 10000  active designers   Our focus is to create a platform for designers that enables them to offer exceptional high quality content  We make their products searchable in unique ways  This allows our customers to speed up their workflow  allowing them to focus on what they love most  Creating   How will you help us   The Head of Data Science   Analytics is the driving force behind the company s data quality  data analytics  data science and experimentation strategy and execution  In this role you will be responsible for attracting and retaining high caliber data analysts and data scientists focused on innovation and rapid iteration  You will report to the VP of Product   You and your team will be owning the data systems for collecting  storing and analyzing data  We are entering a phase of exponential growth and need to scale the tools  data lakes and pipelines to enable data driven product development and decision making at Creative Fabrica   You  along with your team  will dig into the data to uncover insights  identify opportunities for product improvements and new product development  define product metrics with goals  enable experiments and drive customer experience  engagement  and adoption of Creative Fabrica products  As you are building your team we also need you to be hands on and deliver on data needs   Responsibilities  Foster data driven culture of innovation  iteration  and ownership throughout all of Creative Fabrica Recruit  manage and lead a team of world class data analysts and data scientists to support our aggressive growth and deliver key data products and capabilities Be the subject matter expert for driving the product instrumentation  including web tracking tools like Google Analytics and Amplitude  and product data strategy Drive data consistency and quality within a common framework and taxonomy to drive continued improvements to data driven insights across the business Own both the long term technical data strategy and the day to day operations  including fostering innovation and implementing best practices Collaborate with cross functional teams to research  build   improve data analyses to identify opportunities for product improvements  new product features  product utilization and improve customer experience  engagement  and retention Lead the creation of new data driven approaches for the purpose of generating business insights through data analytics  information visualization  and addressing unanswered business issues in a proactive manner Leverage the momentum of the business to create career defining growth opportunities for your team Facilitate Creative Fabrica s development ensuring that data enables continued growth  including marketplace dynamics technologies Design data governance and security protocols Represent the data analytics and data science disciplines throughout the organization  You will have a powerful voice in the company and represent data analytics across different parts of the business  Attract and retain a diverse  high caliber  output oriented team Profile   Essential  Bachelor s degree  or higher  in Data Science  Mathematics  Computer Science  Physics or equivalent  8  years of experience leading and building out a Data Analytics   Data Science team Strong background on Data Engineering and Web tracking tooling  Experience building powerful yet easy to use and adopt data systems and tools supporting high volume and reliable interactive modeling  analysis  and experimentation Proven track record of strong stakeholder management  interacting with senior company leadership on complex issues  Required  Good verbal and written English communication skills Ability to lead and coach while creating a high performance culture  Let us take care of you  Competitive Compensation  We believe that hard work  skills and ambition should be fairly compensated  Flexibility  30 remote days per year  Need a change of scene  Take your laptop  pack a bag and work from the woods  your parents  place or the beach  The best tools and stylish kit  Laptop  Check  Collaboration tools  Check  Killer accessories  Check  Awesome Office  Based in a beautiful office in the centre  working here means delicious lunches in the garden  Friday beers at our local  and access to our own CF library  TGIF  Work Life balance is important   we work hard together  and we have fun together  On Fridays we turn on the speakers  and start celebrating the weekend  Is this you   Get in touch  We d love to speak to you   You can apply by clicking the  Apply now  button   Creative Fabrica is an equal opportunity employer  We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

skills: azure, sql, tableau, python, rest, saas
job_desc: Would you like to put your data analytics experience to use in an independent and responsible role at a fast growing tech scale up ChannelEngine is looking for an enthusiastic Data Analyst to work alongside our business and technical teams to create business value through data  We re working on some cool projects and need more talented people in the team to make our company goals a reality  We re building a data platform  migrating to Azure  and working on machine learning models  You ll be involved in all of this  as well as the day to day of helping convert all the useful e commerce data we have in our platform into digestible business intelligence to provide our stakeholders with the right insights to aid their decision making  What else will you be doing  Using business insight and technical knowledge to define  develop and deliver analytics solutions for stakeholders Liaising with external clients who request data or reporting solutions Communicating with business stakeholders to understand key metrics  analyse business and technical requirements then develop reporting   data applications Developing and maintaining ETL   ELT pipelines and data components to extend and optimise the ChannelEngine data platform Developing rich  intuitive automated dashboards Developing ad hoc reports and providing analytics services to support business decision making processes Searching and applying tools and or methodologies to foster data analytics best practices Documenting relevant code  business requirements and technical processes Providing support to the development of training materials and training activities related to the BI tools and applications Debugging issues  discrepancies and finding root causes  What you ll need Bachelor s degree in Maths  Data Science  or a similar field Minimum 4  years  experience as a developer or analyst within an analytics teams Minimum 2  years  experience in data modelling and SQL Ability to understand and analyse business processes and requirements Experience in dashboard development using PowerBI  Tableau  Looker or a similar tool Excellent communication skills in English  both written and verbal Active listening skills and a proactive approach Willingness to learn new things Availability to work 32 40 hours per week Eligibility to work in the Netherlands without visa sponsorship  Nice to have Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform experience Some Python skills  What can we offer you  Number 1  working at a company that is at the forefront of the world of e commerce and online marketplaces An interesting industry  marketplaces are booming  therefore our company is thriving This is a new role  You will have the opportunity and resources to implement your bright ideas together with the rest of the team We are in the process of building a data platform which brings plenty of interesting challenges   no two days are the same We have plenty of data and lots of demand to consume it State of the art tech  we work with the latest technologies  business models and tools  We re currently migrating to Azure Personal and professional development within a fast growing company with international plans and ambitions Work in our modern office next to Leiden Central Station  with views across the city or  of course  from home We want our colleagues to be happy and healthy  so there are quality chairs and sit stand desks to work at  as well as other ergonomic tools at your disposal Free healthy  and slightly less healthy  snacks  the widest selection of tea you ve ever seen  and exceptionally good coffee to keep you well fuelled throughout the day A very social and passionate team  We have lunch with colleagues  and we like to do fun activities together  About ChannelEngine ChannelEngine is a fast growing  e commerce SaaS solution  We help brands  retailers and wholesalers find millions of new customers by connecting them to the biggest marketplaces around the world Our story began in 2013 when it became undeniable that marketplaces were going to be one of the most critical components of the global e commerce industry  We saw an opportunity to make these powerful platforms available to every business  and now ChannelEngine offers a complete  user friendly  marketplace management suite with seamless integration  enabling businesses to expand their reach internationally  Our clients include Bugaboo  Hunkemöller  Brabantia  Bosch  JDE  and Reckitt  to name just a few ChannelEngine is growing at a rapid pace and currently covers channels in Europe  North  and Central America  the Middle East  and Asia Pacific  Our mission is to cover the globe  For this  we need to expand our teams with adventurous and ambitious people who want to shape the world of e commerce with us Are you up for the challenge  Don t hesitate to send us your application today Job Type  Full time

onderbouwing hiervan  Word onderzoeker energietransitie bij het CBS en solliciteer meteen  Ben jij er klaar voor  Jouw uitdaging De energiewereld is in transitie en we zoeken daarom mensen die kennis inbrengen en kunnen verzamelen  Je kunt daarbij denken aan onderwerpen als de waterstoftoepassingen in de industrie  energieopslag d m v  batterijen  biomassa als grondstof voor de industrie  warmtepompen en stadsverwarming  Je voegt deze nieuwe data vervolgens toe in het bestaande productieproces van onze statistieken  Deze statistieken brengen alle energiestromen  aanbod en verbruik  en alle energiedragers  zowel fossiele als hernieuwbare  in kaart  Je werkt mee aan  nieuwe onderzoeken ontwikkelingen op gebied van de energiestatistieken  bestaande publicaties op maand   kwartaal  en jaarbasis van de energievoorziening  het verbeteren van het huidige verwerkingsproces  van brondata tot publicatie  het schrijven en publiceren van verdiepingsartikelen en methoderapportages  Zo ziet en het is zeker mogelijk om gaandeweg te ontdekken wat het beste bij je past binnen de kaders van het totale werkpakket We werken in hybride vorm thuis en op kantoor  als dat mogelijk is i v m  de of SQL  Je bent collegiaal en gericht op samenwerking binnen en buiten je eigen team  Je kunt je eigen werk goed plannen en organiseren en geeft tijdig aan wat wel en niet haalbaar is  Wat hebben we job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent employee benefits and perks  including bonus potential  Answers to your questions  Inge Loog is available to answer any questions you may have about this role  Contact Inge at inge loog eyeon nl  An individual assessment is part of our selection procedure

Publieke sector biedt Synaxion aan Gemeenten  Onderwijsinstellingen en Bibliotheken haar markt specifieke Business Intelligence software oplossingen en dienstverlening Data Quality  Data Ontsluiting  Data Analytics  Data Visualisatie  Data Science zijn de kern van onze propositie  met als basis het Synaxion Datawarehouse Inmiddels werken honderden organisaties met het Synaxion Datawarehouse en met onze dienstverlening voor Microsoft Power BI voor visueel aantrekkelijke en overzichtelijke dashboards voor rapportage en analyse  Help jij onze klanten met het ontsluiten  het modelleren en het visualiseren van data Synaxion maakt sinds juli 2021 deel uit van de Visma familie  Door samen de  semi publieke markt te benaderen  kunnen we onze ambities nog beter waarmaken  Onze ambitie is om de werelden van eGovernment en Business Intelligence   Data Science nog meer bij elkaar te brengenFunctieomschrijvingEen Data Analist bij Synaxion zet zijn haar kennis en ervaring in en levert een traject met visueel aantrekkelijke analyses die het verschil maken Het verschil maken doen we door data uit interne en externe databronnen te combineren  Op basis van deze data ga je als Data Analist aan de slag met voorspellingen en zet signaleringen en adviezen uit zodat we onze klanten in het onderwijs nog beter kunnen helpen Wat vragen wij Een afgeronde relevante HBO WO opleiding  bijvoorbeeld Your energy As an Energy Data Expert at System Operations  you work with multidisciplinary teams to create the electrical grid of the future  The energy transition presents Alliander with an enormous challenge  The increase in decentralised generation  increasing electricity consumption  the introduction of heat grids and new gases in a single integrated energy system  alongside the creation of the infrastructure and market facilitation to realise these energy flows  necessitate a fundamentally different approach to our processes and services  The team at System Operations works hard to deliver solutions that allow us to make smarter and more efficient use of our electrical grids for our customers  And that s where you come in  because you re the team s technical expert  Your daily work involves transforming innovative ideas for our customers into concrete solutions and processes  One example is a new grid structure that allows us to prevent and resolve congestion in the electrical grid  As an expert at System Operations  you are capable of thinking outside the box  You continuously develop new  technologically innovative solutions  Your environment You and your fellow experts are the technical core and the beating heart of a Scrum team that brings together expertise about energy technology  As a team  you have the space and autonomy to determine your own course as you design and realise the electrical grid of the future  while coordinating as necessary with your environment  In concrete terms  your work involves developing concepts and carrying out grid calculations to realise customer connections without making major capital investments  This is how you contribute to an affordable  reliable and stable electrical grid for today and tomorrow  You are part of one or more multidisciplinary teams that  assess and estimate the impact of customer applications  new customer propositions and technological innovations on our grids and systems  determine the conditions to allow new solutions to be implemented  implement  or arrange the implementation of  technological innovations and modifications within and beyond System Operations in consultation with stakeholders  At the front end  you ensure effective coordination with our end users and supply chain partners  You work with your fellow experts specialists  Scrum masters and product owners  You prepare and maintain user stories and prioritise these based on the backlog  Your employer We are Alliander  a group made up of various companies  including Liander  Qirion and Kenter  We develop and maintain the electrical grid for millions of users in the Netherlands  That s quite a challenge  especially as the energy transition is now in full swing  Thankfully  we can count on the knowledge and skills of our 7 000 professionals  Together  we devise and realise technically smart solutions to prepare our electrical grid for the future  We also try to minimise our carbon emissions while doing business sustainably  In this role  you will join the 7 000 employees of Liander  the grid operator  Together  they manage the daily distribution of gas and electricity through our grids  You share your expertise within the System Operations department  On the work floor  you ll find 15 multidisciplinary teams of 7 10 people who are young at heart and ambitious  Although the teams work hard  there s still time for a joke and a friendly pat on the shoulder  Thanks to the intensive teamwork  they are also very close  System Operations works in an Agile way to deliver the energy supply of the future  One example is the spike app  which allows us to predict and resolve spikes in our grid load  This helps us prevent our electrical grids from becoming overloaded and ensures a reliable energy supply for our customers  System Operations is thus an essential part of Liander and is always looking for new innovations that improve our service  Your working conditions You have the energy  we give you the space   the space to get the best out of yourself  Because that benefits everyone  you  Alliander and most of all our customers  And there s more  In this role  you can expect  based on a 38 hour working week   A good salary  depending on your training and experience  junior max  gross monthly salary  4 530  scale 8   mid level max  gross monthly salary  5 127  scale 9  gross monthly salary  senior max  gross monthly salary  6 001  scale 10   A permanent contract after one year  A Personal Budget of 18  of your annual salary on a full time basis  You can choose to have this paid out  to purchase extra leave days or to pay it into your pension  An allowance of 70  of the statutory minimum wage for parental leave hours  This applies if you take parental leave after one year of service  36 hours  4 5 days  extra saved leave each year  You can use this leave or save it for up to 10 years for a sabbatical etc  A long term employability budget of  500  You can use this for career development  a gym membership and or ergonomic home office furniture etc  A pension with ABP  Alliander pays 70  of your pension premium  A fixed year end bonus of 5 94   Alliander offers you plenty of space and opportunities for development  We work with the best trainers in the Netherlands  You can choose from a wide range of training description 24 40 hrs  As a Data Process Expert  it is your job to update and maintain information in computer systems used by pharmaceutical companies  You will perform data entry activities  compare and verify data and be responsible for the predefined and correct interpretation of this information  It is an important role  as information in these systems must be correct and consistently maintained for internal and external purposes  You will perform data processing activities  compare and verify data and be responsible for the predefined and correct interpretation of this information   Personal blog  Three of our current Data Process Experts have shared their experiences in their personal blogs  Read how Aji Fatou Badjan and Vera Ogbeine look back at their 1 year anniversary and aan klanten binnen heel APG  Het MDM Team verbetert voortdurend zijn processen om deze zo efficiënt mogelijk te maken  Het team streeft ernaar om leidend te zijn in automatisering en optimaal gebruik te maken van de footprint van de onderneming wereldwijd  Het team is multinationaal en omvat diverse datadomeinen  Voor een van deze domeinen zoeken we naar een Data Service Officer  Je belangrijkste verantwoordelijkheden  Uitrollen van het business service model voor onze data leveranciers  De deliverables zijn een servicerapport  dat de in de afgelopen periode aan APG AM geleverde diensten vermeldt   bespreken van dit rapport met de leverancier en indien nodig  vaststellen van opvolgingsacties  Een deel van de monitoring van de diensten van een data leverancier is ook het vertalen van het contract naar de factoren die de maandelijkse rekening beïnvloeden  Deze kostenfactoren  ook key usages indicators genoemd  moeten worden vastgesteld en intern worden gerapporteerd  Verantwoordelijk voor de totale contractadministratie voor data leverancierscontracten binnen de afdeling Operations  niet beperkt tot de juridische overeenkomsten  maar vooral gericht op gerelateerde vaststellen of het werkelijke gebruik van de data in lijn ligt met de afgesproken voorwaarden  Opzetten van een kostenmodel waarmee de kosten transparanter worden als onderdeel van de managementrapportage  Dit breng je mee Je hebt affiniteit met het opzetten van financiële modellen waaronder een initiële analyse van de verschillende variabelen van het model  evenals een eerste opzet van een financieel model  bijv  in Excel   Je hebt voldoende basisvaardigheden in het analyseren van een probleem  definiëren van alternatieven  opstellen van presentaties  memo s enz  Je neemt deel aan diverse bijeenkomsten met externe partijen en moet zodoende de relevante skills hebben om bij te dragen aan service meetings met vooraanstaande dienstverleners  Profielvereisten Relevante hbo evenals de betrokken instellingen en financiële processen  Vermogen om in verschillende teams te werken  maar tegelijkertijd volwassen genoeg om de eigen deliverables te kunnen opvolgen en job_title: Sr Analyst/Consultant, Real World Data Solutions
job_desc: At Certara  we accelerate medicines to patients by partnering with life science innovators  In the past 6 years  over 90  of companies that received new drug approvals by the FDA used our software or services  Our integrated and proprietary end to end platform with biosimulation  regulatory science  and market access solutions combined with our strong team of scientists and subject matter experts enable our clients to have  informed decision making   reduced clinical trial burden higher R D productivity improved patient outcomes   increased patient access to medicines accelerated regulatory approval Certara is a global team that fosters and nurtures a diverse and inclusive culture  We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer  The collective sum of our individual differences  life experiences  knowledge  innovation  self expression  and unique capabilities and talent represents a significant part of our culture  our reputation and our achievement  Together with our partners  we use biosimulation and technology enabled services to transform drug discovery and development across all therapeutic areas and innovative therapies  Job Overview  This is a great opportunity for an early career Epidemiologist Pharmaco Epidemiologist Public Health professional to join a team of highly skilled epidemiologists  statisticians  health economists and consultants  The successful candidate will work closely with other senior scientific staff within the company  This position will allow the Senior Analyst  Epidemiologist to deepen his her skills by writing protocols for observational studies using a variety of healthcare databases  primary and secondary data collection  as well as providing scientific and other technical input during conception  conduct and delivery of various research projects  Main tasks   responsibilities Support RWDS project teams and be accountable to the project manager director for those projects Summarize and synthesize a wide range of medical and statistical information  including disease specific and pharmaceutical product research Develop an understanding of Regulatory HTA requirements for RWE  at least in the European and or North American context Support development of study documents  eg  protocols  analysis plans  reports  posters  manuscripts  under guidance from scientific team members and project manager s Liaise and manage processes with ethics committees  application committees and other relevant stakeholders to support acquisition of data for studies Interpret and communicate the results of clinical observational studies  health economic models  cost effectiveness and budget impact  and statistical analyses Undertake primary and secondary research initiatives including the retrieval and analysis of data  competitive product pipeline information  epidemiology trends  etc  according to needs of the project Participates in production of reports  presentations and publications  Critically analyzes data  presents results and provides internal data analysis  both qualitative and quantitative  and provides strategic thinking with respect to interpretation of results Interact with and foster relationships with existing network of scientific clinical payer experts and data providers Liaise with other consultants assigned to the project to ensure quality delivery of the project Support senior personnel with activities required for business development from time to time Align with and work within the framework of SOPs for data governance with respect to projects led Required Qualifications   Experience Minimum of Master s Degree in Epidemiology  Public Health  Medicine or other related field At least 2 years relevant post graduate work experience preferred Required Skills Professional proficiency in English  written and spoken Experience designing writing protocol for database or other observational studies Ability to work both independently and as part of the team Ability to effectively prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects OTHER INFORMATION  This position can be office based or work from home in the UK  EU  Canada or USA  Number of Employees Supervised  None Percentage of Travel Required  0 10  travel Certara bases all employment related decision on merit  taking into consideration qualifications  skills  achievement  and performance  We treat all applicants and employees without regard to personal characteristics such as race  color  ethnicity  religion  sex  sexual orientation  age  nationality  marital status  pregnancy  physical or mental condition  genetic information  military service  or other characteristic protected by law   LI HM  LI Remote 2199
